Phoenix, Arizona (Maricopa County) Asking Price: $135,000 Gross Income: $385,000 Cash Flow: $96,000 EBITDA: N/A FF&E;: $50,000.00 * Inventory: $25,000.00 ** Real Estate: N/A Year Established: 2001 Employees: N/A Business Types: Convenience Stores Supermarkets

Business Description
Seller is asking $100,000 as a down payment and will carry the balance of $35,000 for 3 years at 8 percent interest which would make the buyer's monthly payment to seller $1,096.78. The financial information was provided by the seller and not verified by the broker. The C-store is currently owner operated with some parttime help. The hours are Monday-Friday 8:30am-10pm, Saturday 10am-10pm, and Sunday 10am-8pm. A #10 liquor license is in place that allows the sale of beer and wine to go. The seller participates in the sale of lottery tickets as well as the sale of phone cards. The store is nicely set up and has large sections of reach-in coolers. This is a good business with excellent lease terms. The surrounding area has a nice mix of businesses, offices, houses, condos, and apartments. A good money maker and a must see!!
Detailed Information Facilities: 1975 square feet. $2392 monthly rent. lease expires january, 2015. there is one 5 year option. Financing: See Listing Summary. Support/Training: Seller will train buyer for one week free. Reason Selling: Other Interests. Broker Information
